title: BrandyBot - AI Branding Toolkit
description: AI-powered comprehensive branding platform featuring logo generation, brand guideline creation, mockup generator, and interactive chatbot. Built with modern tech stack for seamless user experience.

title: GeoInsight Dashboard
description: Geography-based data aggregator with interactive visual dashboards. Features real-time data visualization, Chart.js integration, and responsive design for data-driven insights.

title: Mental Health Model Training
description: Machine learning project training models on mental health datasets. Implements data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation for predictive mental health analytics.

title: Academic Risk Prediction System
description: ML-powered system predicting academic performance risks using XGBoost and Random Forest. Features SHAP and LIME for model explainability and insights.

title: HerVoice - Safety App
description: Mobile safety application supporting UN SDG 5 (Gender Equality). Features emergency alerts, live location tracking, SMS notifications, and secure Firebase authentication.

title: Oven Crust Bakery System
description: Complete bakery management system with website, admin panel, product catalog, and order tracking. Features CRUD operations and user authentication.

title: Lesson Planner System - Java
description: A Java-based lesson planner system using MVC architecture and MySQL. The system features a user login interface, lesson management, teacher management, and CRUD functionalities.

title: Daily Mirror Website Redesign (Group)
description: A redesign of the Daily Mirror website focusing on improving UI/UX design, navigation, and user interaction. Implemented a modern, user-friendly layout while enhancing the responsiveness of the website.
